mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO house_detail ( description, layout_desc, traffic, round_service, rent_way, address, subway_id, subway_name, subway_station_id, subway_station_name, house_id ) VALUES ( #{description}, #{layoutDesc}, #{traffic}, #{roundService}, #{rentWay}, #{address}, #{subwayId}, #{subwayName}, #{subwayStationId}, #{subwayStationName}, #{houseId}
)
